text: Mehran Spice & Food Industries is a food manufacturer based in Pakistan. Mehran offers packaged spice, rice, pickles, and sweet mix. == History == Mehran Spice & Food Industries was founded in 1975. In 2000, Mehran installed a rice plant from Germany. Mehran has production plants located in Pakistan, Saudi Arabia and Dubai, United Arab Emirates. Following is the list of Mehran plants in chronological order: * 1975 – Mehran Spice & Food Industries | S.I.T.E-Pakistan * 1988 – Pure Food Ltd | Jebel Ali Free Zone-Dubai * 2002 – Thar Roller Flour Mill Naukot | Tharparkar District-Pakistan * 2003 – Mehran Spice & Food Industries | Korangi Industrial Area-Pakistan * 2007 – Gul Mohammed Spice Factory | Jeddah-Kingdom of Saudi Arabia Mehran manufactures recipe mixes, straight spices, desserts, Arabic spice & herbs, pickles, chutneys, rice, pastes, poly-bag, ketchup, sauces, beverages & canned foods. FPPCI has awarded Mehran Spice and Food Industries the 'Best Export Award' 33 times since 1984. Gul Muhammad Lot is the chairman of Mehran Group of Industries. == References == ==External links== *Mehran Group official website Category:Companies of Pakistan Category:Food companies Category:Pakistani cuisine Category:Brand name condiments Category:Food manufacturers of Pakistan Category:Food products Category:Pakistani brands Category:Spices Category:1975 establishments in Pakistan Category:Manufacturing companies based in Karachi
title: Mehran Spice and Food Industries
